ComicInfo.Summary:
Andromeda finally cooperates with Senator Spencer who wants the help of Lucien to take Grigorieff down. But this one already got hold of the crystal he needed and has undertaken a mutation of Dayak warriors into furious beasts. In the meantime, the mysterious woman who plotted with Marcus against Petra is getting closer to achieving her goal of total power over Minea...
"Editorial Note: The events in this issue take place before Witchblade #27"
